name: Dark Paradise Nigelopia: Mini Mix
description:
LOLWTF

Key Features


  • 4 Playable Characters: play as Nigel, Reina, Shauna or Rachel, all with fun variations on the same play style, completely unique dialogue, multiple weapons by default and even more weapons unlocked as you play

  • 10 Colorful Stages to zoom across during 4 seperate replay-friendly campaigns, most of which can be played in any order

  • A unique handrawn artstyle and relatively intuitive controls

  • B U T T A T T A C K S. When playing as one of the girls, her butt is the ultimate weapon. Slam it into enemies during Wall Butt Bounces, crush them underneath it by using the Butt Smash technique and gain temporary invulnerability after landing a Butt Dash Impact move

  • An accessible game difficulty designed to lower the action-platformer entry barrier

  • A pretty catchy chiptune soundtrack

  • Over 100 funny, cool, cute and even kinky cutscenes full of Nigelopian banter, presented with emotion images that match the banter perfectly

  • Databases where you can learn cool tidbits about tons of beings that live in the country

  • Optional “Fart Mode,” which takes an already hilarious game and alters the some of the gameplay, cutscenes and sound to crank the humor factor up way past 11

Supplemental Info Below!


Nigelopia Mini Mix is the very first video game to take place in the weird world of Nigelopia, The Dark Paradise. The things that make this Dark Paradise special are far too many to count, but I guess Nigelopia above all else is a place where all beings are accepted and fundamentally considered worthy of love.

Nigelopia may be different from the cultures you have come to know through your lives and even your games, but it is such a charming and hilarious place that those differences won’t even matter much once you step in! Enjoy humorous and playfully raunchy cutscenes between Nigelopia’s ethnically diverse and polyamorous inhabitants. Unlock new powers, and new conversations between them as you complete stages.

Nigelopian people, and the various Shadow Beings that coexist with them called Umbrakin, are surrounded and bound by a force called “The Nigelopian Dark Power,” or just “The Dark Power” for short. It courses through their veins and helps them accomplish their goals. It is this power that allows them to protect their country from those who threaten their way of life… and also to spar with their friends!

The intuitive and tight design of the controls will make you feel right at home, especially if you already love those high speed platformers to begin with, and even if you don’t! Nigelopia Mini Mix is designed to be far more forgiving and accessible than those X-tremely difficult, Mega-hard games of yesteryear.

Enjoy Nigelopia I GUESS??! BOOYAH!!
